resources.string: Please replace \'GOOGLE_MAPS_ANDROID_API_KEY\' in the config.xml with your API Key!
Google Maps Android API v2 is not available for some reason on this device.
The application is miss-configured. This error is not recoverable and will be treated as fatal. The developer should look at the logs after this to determine more actionable information.
An internal error of Google Play Services occurred. Please retry, and it should resolve the problem.
You attempted to connect to the service with an invalid account name specified.
The application is not licensed to the user. This error is not recoverable and will be treated as fatal.
A network error occurred. Please retry, and it should resolve the problem.
The installed version of Google Play services has been disabled on this device. Please turn on Google Play Services.
The version of the Google Play services installed on this device is not authentic. Please update the Google Play Services from Google Play Store.
Google Play services is missing on this device. Please install the Google Play Services.
The installed version of Google Play services is out of date. Please update the Google Play Services from Google Play Store.
You attempted to connect to the service but you are not signed in. Please check the Google Play Services configuration
Since this device does not have any location provider, this app can not detect your location.
Location service is rejected by user.
Can not detect your location. Try again.
